<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>

KR:

EN:
No, I mean, like, think back to when we were inside that Whale.

original:
あの鯨が爆発して…ありとあらゆる欠片でびちゃびちゃになったでしょ。
服も靴も！
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>

服も靴も！
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>

그 고래가 터지면서… 온갖 찌꺼기들이 다 묻었잖아. 옷이랑 신발 할 거 없이!
EN:
When that Whale blew up, we got all kinds of its gross, slimy bits on us. They were on our clothes, our shoes, everything!

…그랬죠.

... Yeah.

だから私たち、あの肉と血が付いた服を洗濯するのに

<CMT_KR>

<CMT_JP>

I have been treated to premium, VIP seats of similar grandiosity back when. This is nothing to fuss over.

In order to prevent cases of unnecessary anxiety and misgivings among the Sinners, the history of accidents that has occurred aboard WARP trains will not be shared.
